description: This script is a bootstrapper for a database visualizer, handling dependency installation and server startup with checks and fallbacks.

methods.name: finish_ok
methods.description: Outputs completion message and exits with status 0, indicating the bootstrap process finished successfully (best-effort).

methods.name: ensure_dependencies
methods.description: Ensures Node dependencies are installed, attempts to re-install if initial installation fails, and pins express to a compatible version.
